sourcesContent:
import '../css/Classroom.css' function ClassroomItem(props) { const classroom = props.classroom const accessClassroom = () => { console.log(classroom) } return (
name: {classroom.teacherNickname}
profession: {classroom.teacherProfession[0]}
status: {classroom.status}
description: {classroom.classDesc}
time: {classroom.classTime}
) } export default ClassroomItem
